mapper.select: SELECT rs_no,m1.name as tname,m2.name as dname,c.startpoint as startpoint,c.endpoint as endpoint,p.cartype as cartype,c.price as price,c.time as time,c.content as content FROM reservation r JOIN carpool_border c ON r.cp_no = c.cp_no JOIN members m1 ON r.id = m1.id JOIN members m2 ON m2.id=c.id JOIN partner_members p ON p.id = m2.id
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET score=#{score}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} WHERE cp_no=#{modalno}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBERS m JOIN CARPOOL_BORDER c ON m.id=c.id join partner_members p on m.id = p.id join reservation r on r.cp_no = c.cp_no where p.id= #{id}
